article_text:
Funeral arrangements have been set for Krystle L. Dikes, 20, a victim in the shooting at an Elkhart Martin’s Super Market Wednesday night.

Visitation will be from 2 to 8 p.m. Tuesday at First Baptist Church, 53958 County Road 17, Bristol. Services will begin at 11 a.m. Wednesday at the church, with calling one hour prior to the service. Burial will follow at Chapel Hill Memorial Gardens

Billings Funeral Home of Elkhart is assisting with arrangements.

Visitation will be from 2 to 8 p.m. Tuesday at First Baptist Church, 53958 County Road 17, Bristol.
